projects.title: GrantBridge
projects.description: A platform that connects grant makers and seekers with AI-powered tools to enhance grant application success rates.
highlights: Developed a recommendation system using machine learning to predict grant success.
Implemented real-time chat for communication between stakeholders.

projects.title: Data Analysis on NYC Restaurant Health Inspections
projects.description: Analysis of NYC restaurant inspection results to uncover patterns in health violations and their impact on customer ratings.
highlights: Utilized k-means clustering to identify common violation patterns.
Performed regression analysis to understand the impact on customer ratings.
